snippet.title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning - Official Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Take a look at the trailer for Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning. The upcoming game will feature refined gameplay, new content, and more. Additionally, a new expansion, Fatesworn, will introduce new content to Amalur 2021.

Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning launches on September 8, 2020 on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox One.

#ign
